Verses: 1 pinbu Avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Nee Kaangiradhaip Pusi; Indha Surulai Nee Pusiththu, Isravel Sandhadhiyaaridaththil Poi Avargalode Pesu Endraar.
2 appadiye En Vaayaith Thirandhen; Appozhudhu Avar Andha Surulai Enakkup Pusikkakkoduththu:

3 manupuththirane, Naan Unakkuk Kodukkira Indha Surulai Nee Un Vayitrile Utkondu, Adhinaal Un Kudalgalai Nirappuvaayaaga Endraar; Appozhudhu Naan Adhaip Pusiththen; Adhu En Vaaikkuth Thenaippol Thiththippaayirundhadhu.
4 pinbu Avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Nee Poi, Isravel Sandhadhiyaaridaththil Serndhu, En Vaarththaigalaik Kondu Avargalode Pesu.
5 vilangaadha Pechchum, Kadinamaana Baashaiyumulla Janaththandaikkalla, Isravel Sandhadhiyaaridaththirke Nee Anuppappadugiraai.

6 vilangaadha Pechchum, Thaangal Sollum Vaarththaigalai Nee Ariyaadha Kadinamaana Baashaiyumulla Anegamaana Janangalidaththirku Nee Anuppappadavillai; Naan Avargalidaththirku Unnai Anuppinaalum, Avargal Unakku Sevikoduppaargalo?
7 isravel Veettaarovenil, Unakku Sevikodukkamaattaargal; Enakke Sevikodukkamaattom Engiraargale; Isravel Vamsaththaar Anaivarum Kadinamaana Netriyum Murattaattamulla Irudhayamum Ullavargal
8 idho, Un Mugaththai Avargal Mugaththukku Edhiraagavum, Un Netriyai Avargal Netrikku Edhiraagavum Gettiyaakkinen.
9 un Netriyai Vachchirakkallaippolaakkinen, Kanmalaiyaippaarkkilum Gettiyaakkinen; Avargal Kalagamulla Veettaarendru Nee Avargalukku Bayappadaamalum Avargal Mugangalukkuk Kalangaamalum Iru Endraar.
10 pinnum Avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Naan Unnudane Sollum En Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Nee Un Sevigalaale Kettu, Un Irudhayaththil Etrukkondu,
11 nee Poi, Siraippatta Un Janaththin Puththiraridaththile Serndhu, Avargal Kettaalum Kelaavittaalum Avargalode Pesi, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Inninnadhai Uraikkiraar Endru Avargalode Sol Endraar.

12 appozhudhu Aavi, Ennai Uyara Eduththukkondadhu; Karththarudaiya Sthaanaththilirundhu Vilangiya Avarudaiya Magimaikku Sthoththiram Undaavadhaaga Endru Enakkup Pinnaaga Kooppitta Magaa Saththaththin Iraichchalaik Ketten.
13 ondrodondru Inaindhirukkira Jeevangaludaiya Settaigalin Iraichchalaiyum, Adharkedhire Odiya Sakkarangalin Iraichchalaiyum, Magaa Saththaththin Iraichchalaiyum Ketten
14 aavi Ennai Uyara Eduththukkondadhu; Naan En Aaviyin Ukkiraththinaale Manankasandhuponen; Aanaalum Karththarudaiya Karam Enmel Balamaaga Irundhadhu.

15 kebaar Nadhiyandaiyile Thelaapeepile Thaabarikkira Siraippattavargalidaththukku Naan Vandhu, Avargal Thaabarikkira Sthalaththile Thaabariththu, Ezhunaal Avargal Naduvile Bramiththavanaaith Thanginen.
16 ezhunaal Mudindhapinbu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
17 manupuththirane, Unnai Isravel Vamsaththaarukkuk Kaavalaalanaaga Vaiththen; Nee En Vaayinaale Vaarththaiyaikkettu, En Naamaththinaale Avargalai Echcharippaayaaga.

18 saagave Saavaai Endru Naan Dhunmaarkkanukku Sollugaiyil, Nee Dhunmaarkkanaith Than Dhunmaarkkamaana Vazhiyil Iraadhapadikku Echcharikkumpadiyaagavum, Avanai Uyirode Kaakkumpadiyaagavum, Adhai Avanukku Sollaamalum, Nee Avanai Echcharikkaamalum Irundhaal, Andha Dhunmaarkkan Than Dhunmaarkkaththile Saavaan; Avan Raththappazhiyaiyo Un Kaiyile Ketpen.

19 nee Dhunmaarkkanai Echchariththum, Avan Than Dhunmaarkkaththaiyum Than Aagaadha Vazhiyaiyum Vittuth Thirumbaamar Povaanaagil, Avan Than Dhunmaarkkaththile Saavaan Neeyovendraal Un Aaththumaavaith Thappuvippaai.

20 appadiye, Needhimaan Than Needhiyai Vittuth Thirumbi, Needhikedu Seyyumpodhum, Naan Avanmun Idaralai Vaikkumpodhum, Avan Saavaan; Nee Avanai Echcharikkaadhapadiyinaale Avan Than Paavaththile Saavaan; Avan Seydha Needhigal Ninaikkappaduvadhillai; Avanudaiya Raththappazhiyaiyo Un Kaiyile Ketpen.

21 needhimaan Paavan Cheyyaadhapadikku Nee Needhimaanai Echchariththapinbu Avan Paavancheyyaavittaal, Avan Pizhaikkave Pizhaippaan; Avan Echcharikkappattaan; Neeyum Un Aaththumaavaith Thappuviththaai Endraar.
22 avvidaththile Karththarudaiya Karam Enmel Amarndhadhu; Avar: Nee Ezhundhirundhu Pallaththaakkukkup Purappattuppo, Ange Unnudane Pesuven Endraar.
23 appadiye Naan Ezhundhirundhu, Pallaththaakkukkup Purappattup Ponen; Idho, Kebaar Nadhiyandaiyile Naan Kanda Magimai Vilanginadhu; Appozhudhu Naan Mugankuppura Vizhundhen.
24 udane Aavi Enakkulle Pugundhu, Ennaik Kaaloondri Nirkumpadi Seydhadhu, Appozhudhu Avar Ennudane Pesi; Nee Poi, Un Veettukkulle Unnai Adaiththukkondiru.
25 idho, Manupuththirane, Unmel Kayirugalaippottu, Avaigalaal Unnaik Kattappogiraargal; Aagaiyaal Nee Avargalukkulle Pogavendaam..
26 naan Un Naavai Un Mel Vaayode Ottikkollappannuven; Nee Avargalaik Kadindhukollugira Manushanaayiraamal, Oomaiyanaayiruppaai; Avargal Kalagaveettaar.

27 naan Unnode Pesumpodhu, Un Vaayaith Thirappen; Appozhudhu Karththaraagiya Aandavar Inninnadhai Uraiththaar Endru Avargalode Solvaai; Ketkiravan Ketkattum, Kelaadhavan Kelaadhirukkattum; Avargal Kalagaveettaar.
